cards.rules_text: You may discard a card or sacrifice a permanent. If you do, look at the top four cards of your library. Put up to two of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

When Disciple of Stir enters the battlefield, it explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

When Covetous Sneak enters the battlefield, uncover. [i](Reveal a Relic you own from outside the game within this card's color identity and put it into your hand, or return an artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.)[/i]
Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Menace
At the beginning of combat on your turn, Knight of Pirinen gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards that left your graveyard this turn.

Vigilance, haste
Trample over battles [i](This creature can deal excess combat damage to the protector of battles it attacks.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The power of nightstone manifests the desires of the city in warped and unexpected fashion.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return up to two nonland permanent cards each with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In the City of Shadows, few things are less permanent than death.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
Whenever Nightpit Reveler deals combat damage to an opponent, uncover. [i](Reveal a Relic you own from outside the game within this card's color identity and put it into your hand, or return an artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.)[/i]

Whenever another Rat enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Skurl Swarmcaller.
• Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of each end step, if a token entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Fiery Pollen deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Don't stop and smell the flowers. Just run.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Into the City enters the battlefield, create a Map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Each creature you control has “Whenever this creature explores, it explores again. This ability triggers only once each turn.”

Target creature you control explores.
Target creature you control explores. 
Target creature you control explores. [i](To explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

When Restless Guardian enters the battlefield, it digs for a 2/1 black Skeleton creature token. [i](You may exile two cards that share a type from your graveyard. When you do, create a 2/1 black Skeleton creature token.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I can't say no to a bargain like that.”
—Pirinen, Blood Merchant[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature you control digs for a token, create an additional one of those tokens. [i](This ability triggers even if you exile cards that don't share a type.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Mistreated in the cities of the living, many goblins saw the ruins of Morstad as a safe haven for their kind.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Each of up to two target creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
Create an Encounter token. [i](It's a colorless Conflict battle with 2 defense and “When this is defeated, draw a card and create a Treasure token.”)[/i]
When Jaded Sellsword enters the battlefield or dies, if you control another creature with mana value 3 or less, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“How do I sleep at night? Comfortably. Now pay up or leave.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Search your library for up to two artifact cards, reveal them, put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard, then shuffle.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Roiling with the infinite potential of nightstone, Morstad draws mercenaries from far and wide—but for every hundred explorers that enter, scarcely one emerges again.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one—
• Create two 1/1 black Rat creature tokens.
• Sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw two cards.

Vigilance, menace
When Ostaad Hireling enters the battlefield, create an Encounter token. [i](It's a colorless Conflict battle with 2 defense and “When this is defeated, draw a card and create a Treasure token.”)[/i]

Trample
Whenever Backstreet Kingpin explores, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature or battle.
Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The dead do not rest easy in the hinterland of the Cursed City. The alchemical pulse emanating from the Nightpit warps flesh and bone alike.[/i]
